Code for ploting diffreent forms of dispersal kernels and testing dispersal 
model functions.  

Data refer to seed dispersal distances estimated by direct assignement from
seed endocarp genotypes 

#### Plotting the kernels

```{r plain, fig.height=5, fig.width=8}
# Plain frequency distribution of dispersal distances.
require(MASS)
x<-assdist$dist
truehist(x,xlim=c(0,20000),prob=F,h=100,col=1,xlab="Distance (m)",ylab="Probability",ymax=350)
rug(x,side=1,col="red")

```
